verbose_text: In the case of excessive inflammation, the decrease of the IL-1beta, IL-12p70, and IL12p70 / IL-10 ratio suggest an anti-inflammatory effect of the BRE, which may drive T cells toward a Th2 profile [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
evidence: BRE, which may drive T cells toward a Th2 profile
